Text: thanks for the upload... unfortunately it appears to have the same audio issues as the rapidshare download that came out almost a week ago.
I can confirm with schicken, the audio is screwed up. Volume is normal half the time and will at random times jump up louder.
Confirming the major volume changes problems. Don't get this file unless you want to go crazy. Sounds like an amp constantly switching back & forth from PCM to Dolby.
